Overview.Summary: The 2022 Bosnian general election is scheduled for August 9, 2022 (10). It will be the third general election under the country's 2010 constitution (10). The election will be closely watched as it is a test for democracy and a race that is too close to call (3). In the latest count, Deputy President William Ruto has a narrow lead over ex-Prime Minister Raila Odinga (5). The previous election was on August 7, 2017 (10).

Timeline.Text: Kenya's 2022 general election is scheduled for 9 August.
Kenyan Deputy President William Ruto delivers a speech on the final day of campaigning for the presidential election.
The country awaits the results of the presidential election, which is too close to call.
Raila Odinga and William Ruto await the verdict of the election results.
The election management body, the Independent Electoral and Boundaries Commission, declares William Ruto the president-elect.
Campaigning for Malaysia's general election officially begins.
Mitch McConnell speaks about the upcoming 2022 Senate races.
The Czech Senate election takes place, along with the Italian general election.
Early voting for the August Primary begins.
The primary election takes place in Minnesota.

Overview.Summary: The 2022 Bosnian general election resulted in new members being elected to the Presidential Council, including Denis Becirovic for the Bosniak post, incumbent Zeljko Komsic for the Croat post, and Zeljka Cvijanovic for the Serbian post (1). The election was held on October 3, and there were no time measurements (2). NATO allies also vowed to support Moldova, Georgia, and Bosnia (3). In 2011, political leaders reached an agreement on the formation of a new central government after 14 months of deadlock (4). An interview with presidential candidate Mirsad Hadzikazdic discussed preparations for the election (5). The internationally appointed High Representative of Bosnia and Herzegovina imposed amendments to the Constitution and Election Law after polls closed (6). The creation of the Republika Srpska and the tripartite presidency has caused problems in Bosnia-Herzegovina (7,8). Kenya's 2022 general election serves as a point of comparison (9). A campaign called "STOP! Hate Speech" was launched in Bosnia and Herzegovina in September 2022 (10).

Timeline.Text: The official campaign period for the presidential election in Bosnia and Herzegovina begins.
The Bosnia Rally takes place, with the option of an additional training day before the rally.
Kenya holds its general election, including the presidential election.
The Presidential Council is elected, with Denis Becirovic securing the Bosniak post, Zeljko Komsic winning the Croat post, and Zeljka Cvijanovic taking the Serbian post.
The High Representative of Bosnia and Herzegovina imposes amendments to the Constitution and Election Law, causing surprise among local stakeholders.
NATO allies vow to support Moldova, Georgia, and Bosnia.
The "STOP! Hate Speech" campaign concludes, with an analysis published by the Press and Online Media Council in BiH with the support of the OSCE Mission to BiH.

While there is speculation about the role of money in the election, the Supreme Court has delivered a boost for democracy (3,4). The ruling party in Angola is currently leading in their election (8,9). In the United States, the Florida Primary Election results have been announced (6). In Israel, the final results have been announced for their 2022 election (2). In Sweden, the results of the 2022 General Election are being constantly updated (7). Charts have been used to explain the Kenyan nation in relation to their upcoming election (10).

Kenya's opposition joins the government after the 2022 general election.
Charlie Crist wins the Democratic nomination for governor in the 2022 Florida primary election.
The final results of the 2022 Israel election are announced.
With most votes counted, the ruling party leads in the 2022 Angola general election.
The Supreme Court in Kenya upholds William Ruto's election as president.
The results of the 2022 Swedish general election are constantly updated by Swedish news agency TT.

Overview.Summary: The 2022 Bosnian general election was held on October 3, with Denis Becirovic securing the Bosniak post, Zeljko Komsic winning the Croat member post, and Zeljka Cvijanovic taking the Serbian seat (1). The results were announced on October 3 and showed that Milorad Dodik received the most votes for the presidency of Republika Srpska (2). Meanwhile, in Israel's general election, 95% of ballots were counted by November 3, 2022 (3). In Kenya's election, William Ruto was declared the winner and elected as the country's next President (4, 19). The election has been described as important and marks the end of President Uhuru Kenyatta's two terms (5). In Bosnia, the election was the eighth since 1996 and took place under the General Framework Agreement for Peace (12). In the US, the August primary included elections for the US House of Representatives and State Senate (17). In Texas, the deadline to register to vote was October 11 and early voting ran from October 24 to November 4 (14). The August primary is scheduled for August 23, 2022, with early voting from August 13 to August 21 (17). In addition, the 2022 Utah general election results were live-streamed by The Salt Lake Tribune (20).

Timeline.Text: Kenya's general election heats up as opposition leader Raila Odinga and Deputy President William Ruto both run in a tight race.
After a closely watched election, William Ruto is declared the winner of Kenya's presidential election.
Texas holds its primary elections, with the deadline to register to vote being October 11th.
Sweden holds its general election, with an interactive graph showing live updates on the results.
Bosnia and Herzegovina holds its general election, the eighth since the signing of the Dayton peace agreement.
Voters in Bosnia and Herzegovina cast their ballots in the country's general election.

Bosnia and Herzegovina elects new members to its Presidential Council, with Denis Becirovic winning the Bosniak post, Zeljko Komsic winning the Croat member post, and Zeljka Cvijanovic winning the Serbian seat.
Alaska holds its election, with full results and maps being published by The New York Times.
Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell speaks about the 2022 Senate races.
Kenya's general election takes place, with voters electing a new president and parliament.
